explanation: The system does not yet have sufficient confidence to predict link failure timing. 2 parallel alternatives are available. The strongest candidate offers an estimated throughput of 220 units. The safest alternate path spans 3 nodes with a composite stability score of -32.0. Prediction uncertainty is influenced by a replication time difference of 0.0 seconds.
